name: erp-college-system
description: A comprehensive ERP system for educational institutions with role-based access control for administrators, teachers, and students.

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../frontend && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run install:all && npm run db:generate && npm run db:push
